name: Siren Head - 3D Horrorgame
description:
Yet another night you wake up hearing sirens in the distance.

You grab a flashlight and head to investigate.

-----------------------------------------------------------

A short 5 minute game focused on atmosphere. 

Mostly for me to gain some experience working in Unity 3D. I hope you guys enjoy it. Please leave feedback and such as I would love to hear peoples opinions and experiences, that's the most fun part of making a game. 

I forgot to add a exit button so just hold alt + f4 to exit the game.
